headline: Show HN: Pipy and Redis and Sentinel = High Available Redis
description:
Pipy is an open source programmable proxy for cloud, edge, and IoT. Pipy versatile nature allow it be used in multiple use cases. The main purpose of this article is to demonstrate the implementation of Pipy as TCP load balancer in front of a Redis master and slave (agent) replication to ensure that client and application connections are always entertained.

More details, refer to "https://blog.flomesh.io/pipy-redis-sentinel-high-available-redis-de82416af864"
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Pipy和Redis以及Sentinel=高可用Redis
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Pipy和Redis以及Sentinel=高可用Redis
description_zh-Hans:
Pipy是一个用于云、边缘和物联网的开源可编程代理。Pipy的多功能性使其可用于多种用例。本文的主要目的是展示Pipy作为TCP负载平衡器在Redis主站和从站（代理）复制前的实现，以确保客户端和应用程序的连接始终被接受。

更多细节，请参阅"https://blog.flomesh.io/pipy-redis-sentinel-high-available-redis-de82416af864"。

Pipy是一個用於雲、邊緣和物聯網的開源可編程代理。Pipy的多功能性使其可用於多種用例。本文的主要目的是展示Pipy作為TCP負載平衡器在Redis主站和從站（代理）複製前的實現，以確保客戶端和應用程序的連接始終被接受。
